item.title: A week with Vim
item.description: During the past week I’ve been learning to use Vim (gVim). Day 1 and 2 weren’t fun to say the least. But now I’m completely hooked. I’m the type of person who will sit there for hours customizing my development environment until I think it’s perfect. I’ve been playing with almost every cool plugin i can find (and wasting a lot of time in the process). So Vim is, without a doubt, the best text editor I’ve ever used.
